You know, I think I want to try going HTML-first here. A top bar displaying the name "Refactorium" wiould be great. We can probably stay single-page for now, as we really just want to explain the connceppt. As an open source project, this is meant to be an agent swarm which refactors code for you. Refactoring is a handled as a cyclical multi-stage iterative process: Research (looking at code and the patterns in its changes over time), conception (identifying opportunities to improve code quality through refactoring), planning (laying out code plans to conduct the refactoring project), expreparation (implementation of additional tests to reduce risks when refactoring), execution (making code changes as described in the refactoring plan), review (assessing qualitative improvements and apparent correctness of changes), reporting (summarizing costs and benefits of the work so far), and direction (providing feedback to orient future areas of focus).
